name: Nicole
greetingText: I really like your name btw!!!
wishText: Hey bebe, even though we haven’t met in person yet, you already mean so much to me. Every day, I feel closer to you, and I can’t wait to finally see you. You brighten my days, and just talking to you makes me so happy. No matter the distance, my feelings are real you’re so special to me. I’m really lucky to have you. ❤️
